description: Get last system logs from the OKTA platform
name: Fetch new audit logs from OKTA

chunk_size.description: The size of chunks for the batch processing

intake_key.description: Intake key to use when sending events

q.description: Filters the log events results by one or more exact [keywords](https://developer.okta.com/docs/reference/api/system-log/#keyword-filter)

ratelimit_per_minute.description: The number of requests allowed to the API in one minute for the token

arguments.title: The configuration to fetch new logs
